uniupo.gaborgalazzo.calendar.domain

Class Agenda

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniupo.gaborgalazzo.calendar.domain.Agenda
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Appointment>

    public class Agenda
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Appointment>
    The type Agenda.
    This object allow you to manage Appointment by adding them, removing them and searching for them.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Gabor Galazzo
    See Also:
    Iterable, Appointment

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public boolean add(Appointment appointment)
            throws AppointmentOverlapException
        Add boolean an appointment.
        Parameters:
        appointment - the new appointment to add
        Returns:
        List.add(Object)
        Throws:
        AppointmentOverlapException - the new appointment overlap an existing appointment
        See Also:
        #overlaps(Appointment)

      • remove

        public boolean remove(Appointment appointment)
        Remove an appointment
        Parameters:
        appointment - the appointment to remove
        Returns:
        List.remove(Object)

      • edit

        public Appointment edit(Appointment old,
                        java.lang.String date,
                        java.lang.String time,
                        int duration,
                        java.lang.String with,
                        java.lang.String where)
                 throws AppointmentOverlapException,
                        java.time.format.DateTimeParseException,
                        java.security.InvalidParameterException,
                        javax.management.InstanceNotFoundException
        Allow you to edit an appointment in this agenda
        Parameters:
        old - appointment to edit
        date - new date
        time - new time
        duration - new duration
        with - new with
        where - new where
        Returns:
        the edited appointment, null if add(Appointment) returns false
        Throws:
        AppointmentOverlapException - the new appointment overlap an existing one
        java.time.format.DateTimeParseException - date or time string has an invalid format
        java.security.InvalidParameterException - duration is invalid
        javax.management.InstanceNotFoundException - old appointment not found in agenda
        See Also:
        Appointment.Appointment(String, String, int, String, String)

      • findByWith

        public java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> findByWith(java.lang.String with)
        Find all appointment containing a determinate string in their Appointment.with.
        Parameters:
        with - the string to search
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all Appointment that containing the determinate string in their Appointment.with.
        See Also:
        #findByPredicate(Predicate)

      • findByDate

        public java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> findByDate(java.lang.String date)
        Find all appointment of a determinate date.
        this method doesn't check date's format because it use Appointment.getDate() equals
        Parameters:
        date - the date
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all Appointment of the specified date.
        See Also:
        #findByPredicate(Predicate)

      • getAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> getAll()
        Get all appointments sorted by date using Stream.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all Appointment sorted by date.
        See Also:
        Stream

      • findByPredicate

        public java.util.ArrayList<Appointment> findByPredicate(java.util.function.Predicate<Appointment> predicate)
        Find all appointment matching a determinate Predicate.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the predicate
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all Appointment matching the determinate predicate.
        See Also:
        Predicate, Stream#filter(Predicate)

      • overlaps

        public Appointment overlaps(Appointment appointment)
        Check if an appointment period overlaps an appointment period present in this agenda
        An appointment period start at their Appointment.date and their Appointment.time and end after Appointment.duration minutes
        Parameters:
        appointment - the appointment to check
        Returns:
        the appointment that overlaps the appointment to check, null if there are no overlaps

      • writeAgenda

        public void writeAgenda(java.io.Writer writer)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Write all appointments in a writer as a JsonArray
        Parameters:
        writer - the writer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - writer IO errors on write

      • readAgenda

        public java.util.ArrayList<AppointmentParsingException> readAgenda(java.io.Reader reader)
                                                            throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Try to add all appointment from a reader.
        The source reader must contain an array of Appointment in Json format.
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader
        Returns:
        an ArrayList containing all Exceptions occurred during the loading process
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - caused by a json parsing exception of the reader
        See Also:
        AppointmentParsingException

        public java.util.Iterator<Appointment> iterator()
        Specified by:
